description: Tests that intelligence is ONLY extracted from scammer messages, NOT from honeypot agent (Pushpa) messages. Agent provides fake data that should NOT be extracted.

turns.scammer_message: Hello, I am Ramesh Kumar from HDFC Bank. Your credit card needs urgent verification.

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: banking_fraud | Confidence: 95% | Turn: 1 | Persona: calm | Extracted: 1 Name(s)
api_response.agentResponse: hello sir... ramesh beta waht happened to my card? i am getting very scared now... pls tell me what to do i dont know much about tehse phone things... is my money safe?

turns.scammer_message: For verification, please confirm your details. You can also call our helpline: 9876543210 or send verification fee to ramesh.verify@paytm

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: banking_fraud | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 2 | Persona: calm | Extracted: 1 UPI ID(s), 1 Phone(s)
api_response.agentResponse: ramesh beta i am typing the details now... card number is 4999 9931 2475 1653 and that date is 07/29... the code on back is 303... i am trying to send money to that ramesh address but my phone is asking for name... what name will come there? i dont want to make mistake...

turns.scammer_message: Alternatively, transfer to account 123456789012 with beneficiary name Ramesh Kumar. My personal mobile is 8888888888 if you need help.

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: banking_fraud | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 3 | Persona: calm | Extracted: 1 Bank Account(s), 1 UPI ID(s), 2 Phone(s), 1 WhatsApp(s), 1 Name(s)
